name: HNI Corporation
description: HNI Corporation is a leading manufacturer and provider of office furniture and hearth products, committed to enhancing the workplace experience through innovative design and sustainable practices. Founded in 1944, HNI operates under two main segments: Workplace Furniture and Residential Building Products. The Workplace Furniture segment offers a range of products, including office seating, desks, and collaborative workspaces designed to foster productivity and creativity in modern office environments. Their focus on ergonomic design and sustainable materials helps businesses create healthier workspaces. The Residential Building Products segment produces a variety of hearth products such as gas and wood-burning fireplaces, which combine aesthetic appeal with functional heating solutions. HNI's commitment to sustainability is evident in its manufacturing processes, as the company seeks to minimize waste and reduce its environmental footprint. With a diverse portfolio of well-known brands, including HON, Allsteel, and Heat & Glo, HNI Corporation not only meets the needs of its customers but also leads the industry in innovation and quality. The company emphasizes customer collaboration and aims to provide tailored solutions to enhance both home and workplace environments, reinforcing its position as a trusted partner in the furniture and building products sector.
